name: Voice Stability Index
description: Represents variations and acceleration in MFCCs — capturing speech tremor, tonal steadiness, and articulation control.

name: Speech Energy Level
description: Based on RMS energy features — measures loudness, intensity, and overall speech power.

name: Pitch Sharpness
description: Derived from spectral centroid and zero-crossing rate — reflects brightness, sharpness, and articulation speed.

name: Tone Clarity
description: From spectral contrast features — measures the clarity and separation between harmonic peaks and valleys.

name: Low-Frequency Power
description: Captures strength in low mel bands — relates to deep voice components and vocal foundation energy.

name: Mid-Tone Balance
description: Summarizes mid-range MFCC activity — linked to vowel sound stability and speech articulation.

name: High-Frequency Energy
description: Derived from upper mel bands — measures breathiness, hiss, or clarity in higher frequency regions.

name: Speech Pattern Consistency
description: Highlights higher MFCC regularity — reflects how consistently the vocal tract patterns are repeated.

name: Harmonic Strength
description: From chroma energy features — shows tonal and pitch stability across harmonics.

name: Pitch Richness
description: Measures tonal complexity and harmonic blending, based on lower chroma components.

name: Voice Resonance Quality
description: Combines high-order MFCCs and chroma range — captures vocal resonance and fullness.

name: Tremor Irregularity Index
description: Uses MFCC deltas and spectral contrast — detects rhythmic instability and micro-tremor in voice.

name: Tone Balance
description: Represents interaction of low MFCC and chroma — reflects tonal evenness and balance.

name: Upper-Tone Energy
description: Tracks energy distribution in upper mel bands — reflects higher pitch dynamics and tone intensity.

name: Smoothness Level
description: Captures chroma and mel interactions — measures flow and continuity of spoken voice.

name: Pitch Fluctuation Index
description: Derived from chroma variation and MFCC deltas — quantifies pitch variation and vocal stability.

name: Vocal Variation Strength
description: Relates to chroma and MFCC spread — shows intensity of tonal and expressive variation.

name: Modulation Depth
description: Represents MFCC derivatives — indicates depth of voice modulation and expressivity.

name: Energy Transition Index
description: Highlights transitions between mel bands — measures dynamic changes in speech energy.

name: Tone Articulation
description: Based on chroma and MFCC deltas — reflects clarity and precision in tone articulation.

name: Harmonic Tempo Fusion
description: Shows coupling of harmonic and temporal components — indicates rhythm and harmonic blending.

name: Vocal Clarity Index
description: Derived from chroma and delta MFCCs — represents purity and definition of voice tone.
